name: market for chemical, inorganic | chemical, inorganic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4588/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'chemical, inorganic', in the Global geography.;This market does not contain any transportation, as it is included in the market for the specific products.;[Dataset to be replaced by 'market for chemical, inorganic, GLO, 2011 - 2011' (af404eff-79aa-4e4a-9c58-7d0e23741b7a)];'chemical, inorganic' describes an unweighted average of 20 inorganic substances, being part of the top 100 chemicals and included into this database. The mix contains solid and liquid chemicals. Their main application is as reagents and intermediates in producing other chemicals.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'chemical, inorganic',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  chemical, inorganic', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
